subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The mission to mend the swing and the psyche of Ike Davis began, with Davis reporting to the Las Vegas 51s, the Mets’ Class AAA affiliate, and immediately getting to work.
snippet: The mission to mend the swing and the psyche of Ike Davis began, with Davis reporting to the Las Vegas 51s, the Mets’ Class AAA affiliate, and immediately getting to work.
